title: Assign a Trailer to a Tractor
description: A driver needs to pick up a pre-loaded trailer from a yard. A dispatcher must assign the specific trailer to the driver's tractor.

tasks.description: The dispatcher identifies the load the driver is scheduled to pick up.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct load record is found.

tasks.description: The system shows which trailer has been pre-loaded with that load.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher identifies the correct trailer number.

tasks.description: The dispatcher creates a 'hook' event in the system, linking the driver's tractor ID with the trailer ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tractor and trailer are now linked in the system.

tasks.description: The driver is notified of the specific trailer number and its location in the yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver knows which trailer to pick up.
